title: groupmanger权限组崩溃
author: yijiang
txt_content:
RT 刚才在配置文件里面加了权限之后 重启在进服务器什么权限都没了 OP连spawn这种权限都没有
删了重新生成一个GM配置文件夹后 把之前的配置覆盖进去权限又失效了 求解怎么回事！！！

replies.author: 最美的夜空
replies.txt_content: 你之前的权限插件配置过程中可能有某个地方配置错误

replies.author: yijiang
replies.txt_content:
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:

    - admin

replies.author: 最美的夜空
replies.txt_content:
yijiang 发表于 2016-4-23 18:56
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
组名不能中文名= =

replies.author: Huge_Black
replies.txt_content: 可能是编码有问题，还有就是组名不能用中文

replies.author: 腾训公司
replies.txt_content: 我之前遇到过 编码问题 转下码重启服务器
